name: Hanoi 1990s
address: 20 Trang Tien, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Set 100 metres from Hanoi Opera House in Hanoi, this apartment features a terrace with garden views. The apartment is 200 metres from Ba Dinh Square. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Vietnam Revolution Museum is 300 metres from Hanoi 1990s, while Trang Tien Plaza is 300 metres from the property. Noi Bai International Airport is 22 km away.
